description: webOS App builder is an application that allows you to create full featured news applications based on RSS feeds for webOS with : - Twitter integration, - Pocket (Read it later) integration - sharing capabilities (Spaz, email, messaging, copy URL), - backup articles in PDF for offline reading, - Advanced Browser support - fast data load, - sliding panels with webOS interface. Creating application with webOS App Builder doesn't require coding skills. How to create your application ? There are three steps. The first two steps are completed on the webOS device and let you create and customize the appearance and layout of your application. After entering all informations, webOS App Builder generates the application code which is sent by email. The last step is done on a windows (XP, Vista, 7) computer, simply copy / paste the code and package the application using the webOS SDK. The whole process done on computer is described with video tutorials. What do I need to know to create an app ? – what rss feed is – how to open an email, -how to download a file – how to extract a zip file, - how to copy and paste, Now let's create your first webOS apps ! All applications created with webOS App Builder use enyo framework and are only compatible with the HP TouchPad running webOS 3.x. More informations and tutorials : http://bit.ly/webosappbuilder
